name: Product Design Portfolio
description:
This is my personal product design portfolio I’ve decided to make open source. My hope is that people new to design can use it as a jumping-off point for their own site. Please remix, learn from it, and use it as you please (just don’t sell it!).


Feel free to rebuild it in webflow / squarespace or even better, rebuild it by hand in html/js/css. Or you can fork my not-amazing code on Github.


This file is not perfect, it’s definitely an example of “done is better than perfect” so some things may be different than my live site.
